item.description:
Checkout Amanda Shaw at Johnny D's
17 Holland St - Davis Square
Somerville MA 02144
617-776-2004

Johnny D's

I enjoyed her the first time I saw her, here's a second chance to see Amanda Shaw.

A New Orleans-based singer, songwriter, fiddler and actress Amanda Shaw is part of a new breed of young, roots-based musicians who have embraced both traditional and pop sounds, creating music that is both authentic and bold. At the age of 16, Shaw is a seasoned entertainer with a substantial audience
across the southern U.S., and is gaining an increasing national presence. She's also received numerous local New Orleans awards, including a Big Easy Award for Best Female Entertainer when she was only 14. With the release ofher Rounder Records debut, Pretty Runs Out, Shaw is poised to take her dazzling showmanship to the national stage.

Listen to Amanda Shaw!
item.how_to_find_us: It would be pretty hard to miss me. I can provide my cell phone number on request to any meetup member who are planning to attend. Should have a meetup table sign too.
item.name: Amanda Shaw @ Johnny D's
